nodes.text: Ondos was a planet lost long ago. It was located in the Core Worlds. Along with Had Abbadon, it was one of a handful of candidates believed to be the planet of origin for either the Jedi Order or their Force-using predecessors.
The second draft of A New Hope concluded with a roll-up stating that the sons of Starkiller would have a dangerous quest looking for the "Princess of Ondos".
